metadata.title: CVE-2016-10119 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Firejail uses 0777 permissions when mounting /tmp, which allows local usersto gain privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.38-1').
